General.Name: Westshore Terminals Investment Corp
General.Description: Westshore Terminals Investment Corporation operates a coal storage and unloading/loading terminal at Roberts Bank, British Columbia. The company has contracts to ship coal from mines in British Columbia, Alberta, and the Northwestern United States. Westshore Terminals Investment Corporation was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1067 West Cordova Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 1C7

3.Name: Mr. Nick  Desmarais
